import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import AuthContext from '../../../context/auth/authContext'; import AlertContext from '../../../context/alert/alertContext'; export default function EditDeliveryAddress() { const authContext = useContext(AuthContext); const alertContext = useContext(AlertContext); const { setAlert } = alertContext; const {} = authContext; const [updateAddress, setUpdateAddress] = useState({ line1: user.name || '', line2: user.lastName || '', email: user.email || '', tel: user.tel || '', }); return (
account_circle
account_circle
email
phone
); }
